verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hey Ho, nobody home. No meat, nor drink, Nor money have I none. Still I will be very merry.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Rose, rose, rose, rose Will I ever see thee wed? I will marry at thy will, sire At thy will

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ding dong, ding dong Wedding bells on an April morn Carve your name on a moss covered stone On a moss covered stone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Ah poor bird. Take thy flight High above the sorrows Of this sad night.
